greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = sum of unsigned elements in row n of triangle A123706.
comment: Triangle A123706 is the matrix inverse of triangle A010766, where A010766(n,k) = [n/k].
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: t[n_, k_] := If[Divisible[n, k], MoebiusMu[n/k], 0] - If[Divisible[n, k + 1], MoebiusMu[n/(k + 1)], 0]; Table[Sum[Abs[t[n, k]], {k, 1, n}], {n, 1, 50}] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Oct 26 2017 *)
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Oct 09 2006
